titleInfo.title: Letter from Alice Kipling, Lahore to Sir Lewis Pelly, India

mods.abstract: Letter from Alice Kipling (n√©e Macdonald, mother of Rudyard Kipling) asking for a portrait of Lewis Pelly and expressing her opinions at the rumours that Pelly has declined a position on the Council of India and that he may instead be appointed Lieutenant-Governor of Punjab.
